titles.title: To eliminate the requirement that States collect Social Security numbers from applicants for recreational licenses.
To eliminate the requirement that States collect Social Security numbers from applicants for recreational licenses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends part A (Temporary Assistance for Needy Families) (TANF) of title IV of the Social Security Act to eliminate the requirement that states collect Social Security numbers from applicants for recreational licenses.
